sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-row align="center">
      <v-col cols="12" md="6">
        <v-autocomplete
          v-model="selectedMember1"
          :items="member1"
          small-chips
          clearable
          color="grey"
          label="参加者を追加"
          item-text="name"
          item-value="name"
          multiple
        >
          <template v-slot:selection="data">
            <v-chip
              v-bind="data.attrs"
              :input-value="data.selected"
              close
              @click="data.select"
              @click:close="remove(data.item)"
            >
              {{ data.item.name }}
            </v-chip>
          </template>
        </v-autocomplete>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>


<script>
export default {
  data: () => ({
    member1: [
    { header: '会社1' },
    { divider: true },
    { header: '会社2' },
    { divider: true },
    { header: '会社3' },
    ],
    selectedMember1: [],
  }),

};
</script>
